amendment.description: To improve transitional assistance provided for members of the Armed Forces being discharged, released from active duty, or retired.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2471 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2471 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12513) To improve transitional assistance provided for members of the Armed Forces being discharged, released from active duty, or retired.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2471 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2471 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feingold.
